page.title: 17 LETWELL PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: { Letwell Parish Council}looks after the interests of{140 adults}and the children.The{Parish Council}sets up the{Bonfire and Fireworks}display on { {November 5th. The parish council}needs new objectives every year. They won the{Best Kept Village in 1982}for {South Yorkshire.}They keep a close eye on the{Dove Cote}and other listed buildings. They also keep an eye on the{local footpaths.}They have also forced the{Yorkshire Water Authority {to}provide the{village}with a new water pipe. They try to get things like getting{roads}to be{resurfaced}or to give an old age pensioner a new dust bin. They complain to other{local {authorities}to get them to provide things. They try to make{Letwell}a better place. The clerk to the{Parish {Council}is{Martyn Sharpe.}
